short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple Chrome extension to summarise text data

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a simple chrome extension which summarises text data given by the user. 

Currently to use the extension please run the app.py file from the Homepage URL on your local server.
